basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ An 286 processor, a 5.25-inch floppy disk, and a monochromatic graphics card mark my early foray into the world of computers, dating back to my early elementary school days. Before completing primary school, I managed to launch my first web pages on the Internet. Now, with technology advancing at an incredible pace, I am rekindling my old passion with full force. However, the Internet has changed; it has become better, evolving into a decentralized form. That's why I am focusing on web3. You can witness how I've transformed into a web3 developer here at becomingweb3.dev.ðŸ’œ

projects.title: Raffle
projects.description: A decentralized application for conducting draws using the Fisher-Yates algorithm to generate random numbers.

projects.title: ZkGreeter
projects.description: This is an almost basic/classic greeter dApp. It have Owner greeting and visitors can retrive that just like other guests greetings. Greetings count strats from ZERO. As always in my dApp's, no costs involved besides that used to run functions.

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
